file_content.text: Soon the doors will open. I hope you will take me with you when you leave this world. There is nothing for me here now.
Jarak did save our lives, and Doctor Oggurobb could make good use of his knowledge.
I know Oggurobb's work. A brilliant scientific mind. It would be an honor to work at his side.
It's easier if I just kill you instead.
You deserve death. [Kill Jarak]
No!
Did you find what you were looking for, Empress?
You tell me.
I have never seen such power.
I am no longer chained.
And what of... your former prison?
Tell our ships to leave orbit. Soon there will be nothing left on Nathema but dust and ash.
You need to haul jets, Commander! Power readings spiking--the whole place is about to blow. I'll pick you up outside.
I can't ignore the atrocities you've committed here. You'll come back to Odessen, but as a prisoner.
I won't let you go free.
A better fate than being left alone on this forsaken world.
I like your style. You don't let little things like ethics get in the way of your research. You'll fit right into my Alliance.
You do experiments for me now.
I promise I will not disappoint you.
He will be a useful tool. However, your enthusiasm for his methods is a bit unsettling.
Jarak didn't make it. Pity.
At least he was right about our escape route...
